title: I recently signed up for directv after being told that I would get local channels in HD.....of course this was not true and now I am in a contract.....can you please follow up on your story from last July and see if there is any update on when we will get local channels in HD?
text:
Other Direct TV customers are getting local channels in HD. You might
want to check with them to see if there is some problem with your
system.
